title: Researcher Examines Use of AI in Young Adults’ Romantic Lives
description: Associate Professor Rebecca Ortiz surveyed young adults about AI companions and found both potential benefits and troubling behaviors with the technology.The post Researcher Examines Use of AI in Young Adults’ Romantic Lives appeared first on Syracuse University Today.
